hero.title: Solving Liquidity for the African Stock Markets
hero.description: We are a privately held, global trading firm, specializing in proprietary investments in equities, derivative products, and venture capital for the US and East African markets. We deploy both quantitative/high-frequency and fundamental trading strategies.

features.title: How we operate
features.description: We deploy sophisticated technologies to make markets more efficient, transparent and fair. This is possible because we have some of the sharpest engineers, technologists, traders and professionals in the world. Our commitment to our people is to give them the tools, training and flexibility they need to be successful.

items.title: Lowering trading costs
items.description: Eigen Fund lowers overall trading costs for market participants by delivering higher execution quality using cutting-edge technology deployment

items.title: Improving the overall transparency
items.description: We maintain the transparency of the financial ecosystem by quoting bid and ask prices for financial products which market participants can trade against.

items.title: Providing Liquidity
items.description: We provide ‘off-exchange’ liquidity by trading bilaterally with institutional counterparties, often through Request-for-Quote platforms.

items.title: Improving Market Efficiency
items.description: We make it easier for investors to buy and sell financial products at a quote price that reflects the current price of the underlying asset.

cta.title: Find out more how we operate
cta.description: We partner with institutions and exchanges that align with our core mission - to bring transparency and efficiency to African financial markets.
